roleData.title: Summer STEM Instructor
roleData.description:
- Taught beginner-level courses, including Python 101, Game Design 101 with Godot, and AI & Machine Learning with ChatGPT, to elementary and middle school students.
- Designed engaging lesson plans, coding exercises, AI demos and interactive activities, helping students build simple games, applications and AI-assisted writing projects, and developing creativity and programming skills.

roleData.title: Teaching Assistant - CS3520 Programming in C++
roleData.description:
- Assisted in teaching core C++ concepts, including memory management, object-oriented programming, and debugging.
- Held weekly office hours and supported over 80 students through Piazza, email, and live sessions.

roleData.title: Web Developer Co-op
roleData.description:
- Contributed to the development and maintenance of CarpoolNU, Northeastern University's ride-sharing web application, built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Prisma and MySQL.
- Conducted vulnerability scans and refactored code to improve authentication and data protection.
- Reviewed and optimized the carpool matching algorithm, for more accurate and efficient user matches.
- Built an administration portal for account management, permissions, and carpool cycle operations.

company.name: Education Innovation's Operations Department at Northeastern

roleData.title: Software Developer Internship
roleData.description:
- Developed a full-stack agricultural management system called Agritrack, with Angular, Django and PostgreSQL.
- Collaborated with other interns to design and distribute questionnaire, collecting valuable feedback from farmers.
- Contributed to design of internal tools, such as an autocomplete system prototype for searching stored crop records.

roleData.title: STEM Literacy Volunteer
roleData.description:
- Supported middle school students in preparation for the Boston Public Schools Science fair, researching in areas such as Data Science and Environmental Science.
- Mentored students in writing technical reports and essays.
